about_the_game:
Get a swift start in EVE Online with the Silver Starter Pack. Unlock faster skill training, access to mining barges, and enjoy a selection of awesome ship customizations.

Includes:

  • 30 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships, and 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 250,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialize your pilot.
  • Nine stellar ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Advanced 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 6 days (or 12 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • Mining Barge Operations Expert System - Instantly inject everything you need to become an expert mining barge pilot for 7 days.

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Get a swift start in EVE Online with the Silver Starter Pack. Unlock faster skill training, access to mining barges, and enjoy a selection of awesome ship customizations.

Includes:

  • 30 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships, and 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.
  • 250,000 Skill Points - Invest and specialize your pilot.
  • Nine stellar ship SKINs - Dominate New Eden and look great doing it!
  • Advanced 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 6 days (or 12 days with the Biology 5 skill).
  • Mining Barge Operations Expert System - Instantly inject everything you need to become an expert mining barge pilot for 7 days.

Single purchase per account.
name: EVE Online: Silver Starter pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Silver Starter pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

short_description: Inside the Silver pack you’ll find 30 days Omega, 250,000 SP, nine stellar SKINs, an Advanced 'Boost' Cerebral Accelerator, and a Mining Barge Operations Expert System.
